title: Meta says it's shut down a pro-Russian disinformation network, warns of a social media hacking operation - CNN
content:
1. Meta says it's shut down a pro-Russian disinformation network, warns of a social media hacking operation  CNN
  2. Facebook, Twitter remove disinformation accounts targeting Ukrainians  NBC News
  3. Facebook-owner Meta says Ukraine figures targeted by hackers  Reuters
  4. Facebook and Twitter remove disinformation and hacking campaigns targeting Ukraine  NPR
  5. Facebook parent Meta says Russians targeting Ukrainians with misinformation and hacking attempts on Facebook  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Facebook's parent Meta said Monday it has caught dozens of fake, pro-Russian accounts, groups and pages across its platforms trying to spread anti-Ukrainian propaganda as the war in Ukraine continues to rage.
